Controls:

"A" and "D" or Left/Right Arrow keys to rotate tiles

"N" and "M" to move between boards

Mouse for moving tiles and button interaction

Description:

A relaxing Tetris inspired style puzzle game with an "infinite" amount of boards. Place the tiles to match the pattern of the board. An entry into Weekly Game Jam Week 87 'Infinite Hallway'. Take on the boards you can afford and make as much money as you can, even if you don't conform to the pattern 100%.

Scoring:

Complete a board in order to win the "Win Amount". Deductions for pattern fails, extra bonus for matching 100%.
